title: "Key LiDAR sensor elements for autonomous vehicles are now made with our technology"
excerpt: "The Korea Institute of Science and Technology (KIST) announced that a team led by Dr. Myung-Jae Lee at the Post-Silicon Semiconductor Institute has developed a \"single-photon avalanche diode (SPAD)\" that can identify objects at the mm level based on a 40nm back-illuminated CMOS image sensor process."
